Package DAO

Class AppointmentDao

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDao
public class AppointmentDao extends Object
This class is responsible for the jdbc queries to the appointments table in the database. Also, it holds the observable lists for the appointments and types of appointments.

    • AppointmentDao

      public AppointmentDao()

  • Method Details

    • populateAppointmentLists

      public static void populateAppointmentLists()
      This method populates all the observable appointment lists. Uses lambda functions in the predicates of the filter methods to filter the appointments based off of the month and or week of the appointment.

    • addNewAppointment

      public static int addNewAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Instant start, Instant end, Instant create, String createBy, Instant lastUpdate, String lastUpdateBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)
      This method adds a new appointment to the appointments table in the database.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the appointment
      description - The description of the appointment
      location - The location of the appointment
      type - The type of the appointment
      start - The instant of the start time of the appointment
      end - The instant of the end time of the appointment
      create - The current instant
      createBy - The logged-in user's username
      lastUpdate - The current instant
      lastUpdateBy - The logged-in user's username
      customerID - The id number of the customer for the appointment
      userID - The id number of the user for the appointment
      contactID - The id number of the contact for the appointment
      Returns:
      Returns an integer of zero if the appointment wasn't added, and returns one if the appointment was added.

    • editAppointment

      public static int editAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Instant start, Instant end, Instant lastUpdate, String lastUpdateBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID, int appointmentID)
      This method edits an appointment in the appointments table of the database.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the appointment
      description - The description of the appointment
      location - The location of the appointment
      type - The type of the appointment
      start - The instant of the start time of the appointment
      end - The instant of the end time of the appointment
      lastUpdate - The current instant
      lastUpdateBy - The logged-in user's username
      customerID - The customer id number for the appointment
      userID - The user id number for the appointment
      contactID - The contact id number for the appointment
      appointmentID - The appointment id number
      Returns:
      Returns an integer of zero if the appointment was not updated, and greater than zero if it was updated.

    • deleteAppointmentID

      public static int deleteAppointmentID(int appointmentID)
      This method deletes an appointment from the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The id number of the appointment
      Returns:
      Returns zero if the appointment wasn't deleted, and greater than zero if it was deleted.

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      This method gets the observable list of all appointments.
      Returns:
      Returns an observable list of appointments of all the appointments.

    • getWeekAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getWeekAppointments()
      This method gets the observable list of appointments for the current week.
      Returns:
      Returns an observable list of appointments for the current week.

    • getMonthAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getMonthAppointments()
      This method gets the observable list of appointments for the current month.
      Returns:
      Returns an observable list of appointments for the current month.

    • getAppointmentTypeList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getAppointmentTypeList()
      This method gets the observable list of all appointment types.
      Returns:
      Returns an observable list of strings of all they appointment types.
